SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CMSPopup] ( [CMSPopup_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CMSPopup_Codice] varchar(200) NULL , [CMSPopup_PubblicaWEB] bit NULL DEFAULT ((0)), [Anagrafiche_Ky] int NULL , [Lingue_Ky] tinyint NULL , [CMSPopup_Titolo] varchar(200) NULL , [CMSPopup_Foto] varchar(300) NULL , [CMSPopup_Url] varchar(500) NULL , [CMSPopup_Tags] varchar(200) NULL , [CMSPopup_Categorie] varchar(200) NULL , [CMSPopup_Click] int NULL DEFAULT ((0)), [CMSPopup_Provincie] varchar(200) NULL , [CMSPopup_UserInsert] int NULL , [CMSPopup_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CMSPopup_UserDelete] int NULL , [CMSPopup_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CMSPopup_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CMSPopup_DateDelete] datetime NULL , [CMSPopup_DataInizio] datetime NULL , [CMSPopup_DataFine] datetime NULL , [Province_Ky] int NULL , [CMSPopup_Province] varchar(MAX) NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CMSPopup] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CMSPopup PRIMARY KEY ([CMSPopup_Ky])
